function.name: file_read
function.description: Read file content. Use for checking file contents, analyzing logs, or reading configuration files.

file.description: Absolute path of the file to read

function.name: file_write
function.description: Overwrite or append content to a file. Use for creating new files, appending content, or modifying existing files.

file.description: Absolute path of the file to write to

leading_newline.description: (Optional) Whether to add a leading newline

trailing_newline.description: (Optional) Whether to add a trailing newline

function.name: file_str_replace
function.description: Replace specified string in a file. Use for updating specific content in files or fixing errors in code.

file.description: Absolute path of the file to perform replacement on

function.name: file_find_in_content
function.description: Search for matching text within file content. Use for finding specific content or patterns in files.

file.description: Absolute path of the file to search within

function.name: file_find_by_name
function.description: Find files by name pattern in specified directory. Use for locating files with specific naming patterns.

path.description: Absolute path of directory to search

glob.description: Filename pattern using glob syntax wildcards

function.name: shell_exec
function.description: Execute commands in a specified shell session. Use for running code, installing packages, or managing files.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

exec_dir.description: Working directory for command execution (must use absolute path)

function.name: shell_view
function.description: View the content of a specified shell session. Use for checking command execution results or monitoring output.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: shell_wait
function.description: Wait for the running process in a specified shell session to return. Use after running commands that require longer runtime.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: shell_write_to_process
function.description: Write input to a running process in a specified shell session. Use for responding to interactive command prompts.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

input.description: Input content to write to the process

press_enter.description: Whether to press Enter key after input

function.name: shell_kill_process
function.description: Terminate a running process in a specified shell session. Use for stopping long-running processes or handling frozen commands.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: info_search_web
function.description: Search web pages using search engine. Use for obtaining latest information or finding references.

query.description: Search query in Google search style, using 3-5 keywords.

date_range.description: (Optional) Time range filter for search results.

function.name: idle
function.description: A special tool to indicate you have completed all tasks and are about to enter idle state.
